help-file.title: SHIP_BASIC
help-file.content:
A dock is much like any other shop, you use "buy #" and "list" to see what ships and ship accessories are available at the docks. You can only buy a ship at one of the major docks in the world. An example is Tharnadia on the Goodie Continent. To buy your first ship, you must also give it a name. Names of ship use ANSI commands so you should first use "Testcolor" command to perfect the name of your ship, otherwise you could end up with a lousy looking shipname.
The syntax for buying your first ship is "buy # <shipname>" where # is the number of the hull you wish to purchase, and shipname is the above mentioned name you create using ANSI commands.
Ok, now you've purchased your ship, the "list" menu at all docks will have changed. You can now see 4 sections instead of just one. From now on, you will not have to state a shipname when you buy or upgrade your hull. You are PERMANENTLY stuck with that shipname for this character.
Next suggested reading: "help SHIP_LIST"
